name: Nonograms Prophecy
description:
ABOUT THIS GAMEHave you ever heard of nonogram puzzles? Japanese crosswords? Paint by sudoku? They are the same: cleverly designed brain-training puzzles. Nonograms Prophecy has dozens of them!
How does it work? The numbers on the top and on the left side of the puzzle show how many pixels need to be filled in horizontally and vertically. Use your logic skills to choose the correct pixels and reveal a hidden picture. Your score depends on the time it takes you to solve the puzzle. Every mistake adds a penalty to the timer.
Kill a bit of time (while waiting for the bus, for example) to solve one of the easiest puzzles with 5x5 pixels. Be ready to devote much more time to deal with the bigger puzzles – pixels up to 20x20 – the hardest ones.
Nonogram Prophecy offers over 100 puzzles with pictures divided into thematic groups: food, zodiac, vehicles, etc.FEATURES
Interactive tutorial will explain everything easily
A game for 10 minutes or 10 hours
Over 100 nonogram puzzles
Four puzzle sizes - from 5x5 to 20x20 pixels
